thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 11 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Telefonica Deutschland Places Promissory Note Loan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Telefonica Deutschland Places Promissory Note Loan
text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Telefonica Deutschland:
* TELEFÓNICA DEUTSCHLAND HOLDING AG: ANNOUNCEMENT OF PROMISSORY NOTE LOAN AS A COMBINATION OF TRADITIONAL PLACEMENT AND A BLOCKCHAIN TRANCHE
* ‍TELEFÓNICA DEUTSCHLAND, LBBW, DZ BANK ANNOUNCE PLACEMENT OF A PROMISSORY NOTE LOAN WITH A TARGET VOLUME OF EUR 200 MILLION​
* PLACEMENT INCLUDES ‍A TRANCHE THAT IS EXCLUSIVELY MARKETED BY LBBW WHICH IS USING BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY CONSISTENTLY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
